TunableList.name: DEFAULT_MOOD_CATEGORIES
TunableList.description: These mood categories will always be available for photography modes that support mood categories. Additional mood categories can be specified in the Take Photo tuning.

TunableTuple.description: Mood categories are selectable in the photography UI for certain photo modes. When a player selects a mood category, one of the mood param values associated with it is passed to the pose asm as the mood param value.

TdescFragTag.name: actor_tests_pass_all
TdescFragTag.description: A set of tests which will be run on the actor when there are no target Sims (such as 1 Sim selfies).

TunableTuple.name: icon_tuning
TunableTuple.description: A set of icons to associate with this mood category. Different icons are for different states of the mood category's button in the UI.

Tunable.name: down_icon
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: over_icon
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

Tunable.name: up_icon
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableList.name: mood_param_values
TunableList.description: A list of mood param values (strings). One of these will be selected at random if a player selects this category in the UI.

TdescFragTag.name: target_tests_pass_all
TdescFragTag.description: A set of tests which will be run on every photo target. The target will be the Target Participant and the photographer will be the Actor participant. These tests must pass for all targets for this mood category to be included. These will only run for multi-Sim photos.

TdescFragTag.name: target_tests_pass_one
TdescFragTag.description: A set of tests which will be run on every photo target. The target will be the Target Participant and the photographer will be the Actor participant. These tests must pass for at least one target for this mood category to be included. These will only run for multi-Sim photos.

Tunable.name: test_for_incest
Tunable.description: If checked, this mood category will be disabled if any pair of targets fails the incest test.

Tunable.name: tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip for this category in the photography UI.

TunableList.name: CLIP_INDEX_VALUES
TunableList.description: When we pose sims during tripod photography sessions, we don't want two sims to choose the same pose clip. To avoid this, client assigns a unique value to each actor's ClipIndex parameter. This is a list of all valid ClipIndex values from which a unique element will be assigned to each actor being posed. Note: Gameplay needs to make sure this list is kept in-sync with the ClipIndex animation parameter.

TunableList.name: CLIP_INDEX_VALUES
TunableList.description: When we pose Sims during selfie photography sessions, we don't want the Sim to choose the same pose clip in a row. To avoid this, client assigns a unique value to each actor's ClipIndex parameter. This is a list of all valid ClipIndex values from which a unique element will be assigned to the actor being posed. Note: Gameplay needs to make sure this list is kept in-sync with the ClipIndex animation parameter.
